content: why lock here welcome back treasure piles everyone's done I do them
too no web series on dungeon crafting is complete without them so simple though
they may be let's knock it out treasure piles begin with some cardstock measure
out a square no larger than two inches this is because we wanted to fit on any
possible tile apply a thick blob of hot glue try and
make the edges irregular if you want a taller pile then allow it to cool and
then add more otherwise if you just keep adding it it'll melt itself and spread
out apply a thick coat of white PVA glue use needle nose pliers to place some
gemstones in the glue I use high quality Swarovski gemstones might be overkill
but there's definitely a huge difference in the sparkle between these and the
cheap plastic ones that you can buy by the pound here's some models that I
recommend next apply the gold glitter while the
white glue is still wet there seems to be two schools of thought on this I've
seen people use glitter that it has very large flakes but I like to use a very
fine glitter this stuff that I'm using has the consistency of baking flour I
mean it it it's real mess if you don't tend it properly it's also more
expensive but again the shine you get from it is superior to the kind with
large flakes you can see it even overwhelms the focus of this camera so
dump off the excess and let it dry overnight and then cut it out
as for gameplay you might remember we use this piece back in the Volta victus
episode 17 already worst episode ever my Locke thank you for joining me and
I'll see you next time
